topic.title: How to Factory Reset Cisco Phones
topic.shortdesc: Before you start to provision Cisco phones with , you need to reset Cisco phones to factory default settings. Otherwise, Auto Provision may fail because of the previous configurations on the phone.

body.p: This guide takes Cisco SPA502G running firmware 7.6.2c as an example.

ol.li: Press the Settings key, and navigate to Factory Reset.

Press select.
The phone prompts you whether to reset all parameters to factory default values.

Press ok.
The phone will be reset successfully after startup.
Do not power off during phone startup.
